mapper.select: select avg(b.score ) from store a, review b where b.s_seqno=#{sSeqno} and a.s_seqno=b.s_seqno
select count(a.score ) from review a, store b where a.s_seqno=#{sSeqno} and a.s_seqno=b.s_seqno
select * from store a, (select s_seqno, avg(score) as avg from review group by s_seqno) b where s_type=#{sType} and a.s_seqno =b.s_seqno(+)
select a.menu_seqno, a.s_se, b.s_name, a.menu_name, a.menu_price, a.menu_ex, a.menu_img, a.menu_cal from menu a, store b where b.s_seqno=#{param1} and a.s_se = b.s_seqno
select * from store where s_name like '%'||#{param1}||'%'
select b.s_name, a.m_id, a. r_content, a.r_date, a.score from review a, store b where b.s_seqno=#{param1} and a.s_seqno = b.s_seqno order by a.r_seqno desc
select * from menu where menu_seqno=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
select b.s_name, a.r_content, a.r_date, a.score, a.r_seqno from review a, store b where a.m_id=#{mId} and a.s_seqno = b.s_seqno order by a.r_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from zzim where m_id=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from zzim where m_id=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
select count(*) count from zzim where s_se=#{param1}
select * from zzim a, store b where a.s_se=b.s_seqno and a.m_id=#{param1}
